root.name: The Weakest Link & Friends
root.description: OverviewThe Weakest Link Friends is a game show game developed and published by Ludia, Inc. for the iPhone and iPad platforms. The Weakest Link Friends is based on a TV trivia game show titled The Weakest Link.The Weakest Link Friends is the third game released in the " Friends" series of game show games that are developed by Ludia.

similar_games.game: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? & Friends
